subject: Basketball
Documentary Films and Programs
Television
lead_paragraph: “The Doctor,” a new documentary about Julius Erving on NBA TV, delves into his amazing feats on the court and may make fans smile or cry, but it leaves out significant information.
snippet: “The Doctor,” a new documentary about Julius Erving on NBA TV, delves into his amazing feats on the court and may make fans smile or cry, but it leaves out significant information.
